mapper.sql: id, productId, count, comsumerId, price, brokerage, operateUserId, expressCom, expressNum, createTime, confirmTime, tpye

mapper.update:
update order
productId = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comsumerId = #{comsumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brokerage = #{brokerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateUserId = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
expressCom = #{expressCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expressNum = #{expressNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirmTime = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tpye = #{tpye,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order set productId = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comsumerId = #{comsumerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brokerage = #{brokerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operateUserId = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expressCom = #{expressCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expressNum = #{expressNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirmTime = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpye = #{tpye,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
